title: Interpretation of a dream about a scene in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tent in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. In the dream, some uses explain seeing a tent in a dream, and we will learn about them through this article, because the meaning of a tent in a dream for men is completely different from the meaning for women. In some cases, the scene could be a trip or a wedding. You see a scene in Dream of an unmarried girl. This article will describe in detail the situation of seeing the scene in a dream, the scene also shows collecting money and profit from trade. The scene indicates a safe and stable life as well as the girl’s marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a tent by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a dream is evidence of the death of the patient. A scene in a dream represents travel, and for single people, it can mean that they are about to get married. If one sees a white tent in a dream, this It indicates that he is a person who enjoins virtue and forbids evil. I saw in my dream that I was exporting tents is a sign of losing business. Seeing yourself in a scene is evidence that life is about to change for the better. Interpretation of a dream of a scene for a manFor men, a tent represents power and high status Seeing scenes of people wanting to travel is a good sign for traveling to make money. A scene in a man’s dream can mean a good wife. In some visions, the scenes represent death. Interpretation of a dream about a bachelor’s scene: Seeing a scene in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of her marriage to a virtuous man. Dreaming of scenes of girls is a sign of joy and happiness. If you find a girl living in a tent, this means that she is about to get married. Demolishing a tent in a dream is evidence of the destruction of the girl’s home. Destroying a tent pole in a dream may indicate the death of the father. Seeing a military scene in a dream means That the girl will marry a good and high-ranking person. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi in a dream: If someone sees him on the scene, it means that something has changed in the life of the fortuneteller. I saw in my dream that the hair tent is an evil sign for those in the tent, and the hair is good. And the collapse of the stage in the dream Show worry and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about a scene for a married woman. Seeing scenes about a married woman indicates wealth and gains. Leaving the stage in a dream is a sign of financial loss, stress and suffering. Interpretation of a dream about a scene about a pregnant woman. The scene that a pregnant woman dreams about is a sign of easy childbirth. It may mean Tents Pregnant women enjoy a wide range of decent livelihoods and good luck. If a pregnant woman finds herself giving birth in a tent, this indicates the birth of a boy. title: Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin and other scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream: A mountain in a dream is evidence of fear and psychological disturbances, either fear of success or fear of falling, but both are fears. Climbing a mountain means success and descending from it means failure and collapse. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not leave anything in life that appears in a dream. Unless he interprets it with many accurate interpretations, and the mountain is one of the things that Ibn Sirin interpreted and said: Seeing it in a dream could mean that the dreamer and all the inhabitants. From his homeland, he suffers from a sultan who knows nothing of kindness and tenderness of heart. He is harsh in his dealings with them and makes decisions as he sees fit. Hence, the mountain can be interpreted as the injustice and inability of the rulers. To protect their subjects. Perhaps a dream about a mountain means that the dreamer will meet someone with the same strength and size as the mountain. If the dreamer sees himself hiding in the shadow of the mountain, or sitting on its peak, this is a sign that he will have the good fortune to meet a tall man and he will approach him, and perhaps he will be one of those. Those present. If the dreamer climbs the mountain and starts repeating the Islamic call to prayer, the more his voice is heard and echoes loudly, the more his fame increases and the more young and old he becomes famous. If the dreamer dreams that he is climbing the mountain with a bow and arrows, and when he reaches the top of the mountain, he takes the bow, puts in one of the arrows he has and shoots the arrow. Until he got to a place where he worked. Published in it, as well as his speech, which will be revered by the inhabitants of this place as a whole, and the further the arrow is thrown to a distant place, the higher the dreamer's position will be. It is. If the dreamer was climbing it and when he stood on it he felt fear, then this is safety and protection in reality, and if he dreamed that he was riding a ship and left it because it was not safe and took refuge inside the mountain then this is destruction and disaster that the dreamer will encounter. If the dreamer sees that he is climbing the mountain and suddenly falls from it, then this A religious defect, and a disregard for prayer and the Sunnah of the Prophet. If the dreamer falls from a mountain in an unsafe place with an abundance of lions, snakes, reptiles and predatory animals, then this is an inevitable sin, repentance and good deeds. If the dreamer intends to travel by sea in his waking life and sees the mountain in his dream, then this A sign that his journey has been interrupted for any reason and this will cause him to stop and the interests that he wanted to travel to achieve. If the dreamer sees that he was able to crush the whole mountain, this is a sign that he will commit the murder of a man whose body is huge and whose stature is also great, so he may be a politician High-level. Interpretation of seeing a mountain. When a dreamer sees a mountain collapsing in his dream, this is evidence of obstacles and troubles. He will have a period of anxiety and sadness, and he will face many misfortunes and misfortunes. It can carry meanings of goodness and livelihood, sometimes poverty and humiliation, sometimes strength and stability, and sometimes weakness and humiliation. And depending on the person’s status and position in life, his gender, or which group of society he belongs to, the interpretation of seeing him through it. What is the interpretation of seeing a green mountain in a dream? When the dreamer sees in a dream that the green mountain has collapsed, this is evidence of the death of the enemy, getting rid of him, and victory over him. But if the Green Mountain disappears...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a river according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the river in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is the interpretation of all cases in which the river comes in a dream for a man, a woman, a pregnant woman, an unmarried girl, and other dreams on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the river in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the presence of the river in a dream as evidence that there is someone He has authority or a decision-maker, and he is one of the righteous who rule fairly among people. If a person sees in his dream that the river is going through a process of backflow, this indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in his work or in his social life. And whoever sees in his dream that the river is the water that There is a high and high percentage in it, so this is a good person, which indicates that the dreamer gives you God’s blessing and it will come and come. With a lot of money and food in his life, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that the river leaves its place and goes to the road, this indicates that the dreamer will have problems and that he will suffer from injustice between them. Whoever sees in his dream that the river cuts trees from the land, this is evidence that the dreamer He will emerge from the injustice that befell him, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that the river came and took your food with it, this indicates that there is a person in power and in his position who wants to take your money from him by force and resentment. Whoever sees in his dream that he is working on digging a place to become a river, then this Evidence of the dreamer that God will bless him with abundant money. Whoever sees in his dream that he wants to drink from the river water and drinks from it, this indicates that the dreamer will work in business with a strong and powerful person, but he will take away all his rights from him. Whoever sees in his dream that he crosses The river from one side to the other, this is evidence that the dreamer was facing some problems, but this period will pass and joy and happiness will come to the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he has reached the bottom of the river and is dirty with the mud inside it, then this does not deserve praise. It is evidence of problems, sadness and distress. Whoever sees in his dream that the river entered your house, but the house did not flood, this is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from great problems, distress and distress. Whoever sees in his dream that the river destroyed his house, this is one of the dissolving dreams and evidence that the dreamer will suffer a lot of harm, and God knows best. Interpretation The river in a dream for a single girl: The river in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that the dreamer is one of the chaste girls who will marry a man of religion and morals, God willing. And if she dreams that she is drinking river water, this is evidence that God will provide for her everything she desires. And whoever sees that he falls into the river This indicates that the dreamer faces some problems, but she will get rid of them. Interpretation of the river for a married woman in a dream: The river in a married woman’s dream indicates that God will provide her with abundant and abundant wealth. The river in the dream also indicates that her husband is trustworthy and loves her very much. And whoever sees her bathing In the river and she washes her body and hair, this is evidence that God will bless her with a son in the coming season, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dry river in a dream: A dry river in a dream is neither desirable nor desired, as it is evidence of money and livelihood emanating from the dreamer and the unmarried girl, which indicates that there is someone He wants to marry her and he is not. Good and suffer from

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband talking on the phone

preview.html: Meaning of a dream about my husband talking on the phone The phone and talking on the phone are an important part of our dreams. First of all, we should note that when we talk on the phone we cannot see the interlocutor, so it is often easier for us to transfer any information to him. In addition, in any call Telephone, the interlocutor does not see our face. Therefore, the dream in which we can talk on the phone should be interpreted with these features in mind. In the modern world of dreams, a person often needs to talk on a mobile phone. On the one hand, this is just a sign of time and nothing More than that, but on the other hand, this indicates freedom of communication and movement during the events for which the sleep is interpreted. This dream can be a sign for some women that they are being betrayed, especially if they have little or no trust in their husbands. Since Infidelity is one of the disturbing dreams for a woman. It stems from her husband’s feeling of insecurity. Therefore, in the following parts, we will provide you with an interpretation of a dream about my husband talking on the phone. Interpretation of a dream about my husband talking to a woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the wife sees her husband with another woman. It shows that Her husband is really cheating on her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a mobile phone for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about my husband talking to another woman and sleeping with her. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of seeing the husband talking to another woman and having sex with her, but this woman is not known to the wife. This dream indicates that her husband loves her And he is a person of good morals and religion. They are faithful to their wives, and this is evidence that their relationship will develop for the better in the coming days, God willing. But if the wife sees in a dream that her husband is talking to another woman and having intercourse with her, then this woman is also known to the woman. This dream indicates that The spouses will be exposed to major financial crises due to their extravagance in spending more money. If a woman dreams that her husband is sleeping with a very beautiful woman in a dream, this dream is evidence that the husband will risk his money in an inappropriate place of work or project and thus will incur many losses. According to the scholar Ibn Sirin If the wife sees in a dream that her husband is talking to another woman and kissing her, it is an indication that this woman will need help because she may have made a request from the husband and the husband agreed to help her fulfill her request. Interpretation of the dream of the husband marrying another woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the wife The woman who sees her husband in a dream marries another woman. It indicates the marital happiness that exists between the spouses, and this dream can also be an indication of the fulfillment of dreams and hopes, God willing. Did you dream that your husband was with another woman? As the dream book says, the meaning depends on the feelings Which you experienced in a dream.And if you feel strong resentment, jealousy and pain, then in these relationships an unpleasant surprise is also possible in reality, since perhaps the man has already made a secret connection or will soon do so.But when such a plot was received quite calmly, in In fact, it means you don't

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a plane landing in a house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home: Seeing a plane landing in a dream is one of the dreams that arouses the dreamer’s curiosity to know what he is eating, is it good or bad? In the following lines, we will explain all the details so that the sleeper can be reassured or take care of something. Read with us to discover everything new. Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home. Seeing the plane landing at home in a dream for the dreamer indicates the changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and obtaining a great reward. At work, he can improve his financial and social situation and land the plane at home in the dream. The sleeper indicates that he knows the news of his wife’s pregnancy, and those close to them will be filled with joy and happiness for their near future. Seeing the plane landing at home in a dream for a woman leads to the success of the projects that she runs that bring benefit and benefits to her life. And the plane landing and crashing into the house in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes the many losses that will affect her for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing in Ibn Sirin’s house Ibn Sirin says that seeing a military plane landing in the house in a dream for the dreamer indicates that her husband will marry another woman without her knowledge. And happy. Seeing the plane landing in the house in a dream indicates the end of the crises and problems that were occurring between the man and his family due to the inheritance, and things will return to their track in the future. A big deal in its field. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A website about dream interpretation secrets. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of dreams of a plane landing in the house for unmarried women. Seeing the plane landing in the house for an unmarried woman indicates For her success in achieving her dreams and desires in the coming period, her family will be proud of what she has achieved in a short period. The plane landing at home in the dream shows the girl the happy news that will change her life into prosperity and stability. To see the plane landing at home in a dream for the girl symbolizes her close marriage to the man. Which she was hoping to get close to, and happiness and joy will rule her home in the next life and the plane landing from the house into the dreamer’s sleep leads to the approach of the Gulf and the end of the crises and sorrows that have afflicted her in the past days. Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home for a married woman: Seeing a plane landing at home in a dream For a married woman, it symbolizes the happy married life she enjoys with her husband and raising her children according to Sharia and religion so that they will be good in society later on. Preventing her from returning last time. Seeing the broken plane landing in the house in a woman’s vision leads to quarrels and problems that will appear for her and may lead to separation, and the plane landing in the house in the dreamer’s sleep with the destruction of the furniture symbolizes her betrayal by her friends. And the life partner who may suffer from psychological and nervous shock that lasts for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home for a pregnant woman: Seeing the plane landing at home in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the death crises and pain that she was going through in the past.

Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home for a married woman: Seeing a plane landing at home in a dream For a married woman, it symbolizes the happy married life she enjoys with her husband and raising her children according to Sharia and religion so that they will be good in society later on. Preventing her from returning last time. Seeing the broken plane landing in the house in a woman’s vision leads to quarrels and problems that will appear for her and may lead to separation, and the plane landing in the house in the dreamer’s sleep with the destruction of the furniture symbolizes her betrayal by her friends. And the life partner who may suffer from psychological and nervous shock that lasts for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a plane landing at home for a pregnant woman: Seeing the plane landing at home in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the death crises and pain that she was going through in the past.

title: Interpretation of a dream about circumcision in a dream and the consequences of seeing circumcision in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the dream interpretation of circumcision in a dream or circumcision in a dream through a website in dreams, see the opinions of dream interpreters of seeing circumcision in a dream and the consequences of the dream interpretation of circumcision of a boy and its interpretation. Circumcision in a dream is for singles, married people, and men. Interpretation of a dream about circumcision. Interpretation of a dream about circumcision in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s purity and compliance with what is forbidden, and it is said that circumcision in a dream is a joy. Seeing circumcision in a dream may indicate his distance from the sins and transgressions of the sinner, and it is said that it is evidence of escaping from temptation. Circumcision in a dream, from Ibn Sirin’s point of view, is evidence of the purity of the soul and body, and it is evidence of the dreamer’s atonement for his sins. Circumcision in a dream can also mean the dreamer’s separation from one of his relatives and it is said that it is a sign of mastery of the work. It was said: Whoever sees in a dream that Uncircumcision: It may indicate that he has abandoned Islam for the sake of money that benefits him. Whoever circumcises men or is circumcised in a dream will enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and will be in honor with God Almighty. The interpretation of a dream about circumcision for a man is good for him and praiseworthy, and indicates purity and indicates success or participation in a successful project. See Also: Seeing a doctor in a dream Interpretation of a dream about surgery Circumcision in a dream The interpretation of circumcision in a dream can indicate piety and righteous obedience, and it has been said that circumcision in a dream is a sign of complete health. It has been said that the interpretation of purification in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances and his good morals or morals. The improved. Interpretation of a dream about circumcision and seeing blood in a dream may indicate menstruation and may indicate marriage, according to the fortuneteller’s aunt. Perhaps a dream about circumcision indicates the end of rumors and false news and their disappearance, and it is also evidence of the truth. Seeing circumcision in a dream means asceticism in this world and work To please God Almighty. Refusing circumcision in a dream indicates falling into chaos and immorality and may indicate that it is a warning from God to the dreamer to stay away from sins. Interpretation of a dream of circumcision of a boy. Interpretation of seeing a child circumcised in a dream? Interpretation of circumcision of a boy in a dream indicates his good health, health, and prosperity, with permission. God.Interpretation of dreams about circumcising a young child and his mother is the one who circumcises him, may indicate that she cares for him and takes care of him.Interpretation of a dream about purifying a child and his refusal to purify himself in a dream portends bad for him and may indicate illness, and God knows best.Interpretation of circumcision in a dream for a single woman.Interpretation of a dream about circumcision In a dream for an unmarried woman, it indicates marriage to her and perhaps an indication of menstruation. It is said that chastity in an unmarried woman’s dream is repentance, and the fear of circumcision in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the presence of bad friends. The interpretation of a dream about circumcision for an unmarried woman indicates her weakness, If circumcision was performed without her consent, it is evidence of her injustice. The dream interpretation of refusing circumcision for unmarried women indicates a delay in marriage and may indicate the rejection of the person who proposed to marry her. Whereas if the dreamer sees his unmarried sister committing adultery with someone, this may indicate her marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I know everything that no one has seen. If the dreamer sees a married sister committing adultery, this may indicate unpleasant things, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his sister committing adultery with him, then he can express the fulfillment of the sister’s desires and defend her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing determination in a dream. Interpretation of preparing food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of insistence in a dream, as we all know that all creatures cannot live without food and drink, because it provides the body with the energy it needs to work and move, and one of the visions that disturbs many is insistence (determination) in a dream, which prompted us today through the encyclopedia website to talk about the correct versions to see insistence in a dream for a single woman and pregnant women and a lot of important information. Interpretation of seeing determination in a dream We find that seeing determination in a dream or determination has connotations that indicate good and others that indicate evil. Cruelty and generosity, and if one sees that he is sitting at a table with rich food, this is a good sign and an indication that things will calm down and your material problems will be solved, while it is bad if the person invites others to eat and they do not attend, this indicates guilt and evil if one sees that he is sitting on a material that does not contain food or that people are curious, this is a sign that he will be disappointed, and whoever sees that he is eating alone, this means that he feels depressed, lonely and sad. Interpretation of an invitation to eat in a dream The interpretation of your invitation to eat in a dream differs according to whether the dreamer was invited or was invited, and this is as follows: The person invited to the meal If someone sees in a dream that he was invited to solve or make a decision or eat and accepts this invitation and sees food in his dream. ... feeds a vegetarian), while the dream tends to regret and blame the insight for something he did if he saw in his dream one of these foods (chicken, beef, rabbit meat, .... meat in general). And whoever sees in his dream that he was prevented from a feast or a large invitation in which food is shared in abundance, this is a good sign and an indication that the dreamer will live in luxury and great ability to his money and preserve his health. When a person sees that he is fully invited to food and that the foods he eats from are really familiar to him, this is a good sign for the dreamer, while if the food is unknown to the visionary, this is a sign that something bad will happen to the dreamer soon. If one dreams that he is sitting in a dining room with delicious food and his clothes are elegant, this is a sign that he will become very rich in the near future and will earn from his work. The owner of the invitation If one dreams that he is the one who invites others to eat or intends, or even intends to invite someone to solve it, this is a bad sign and an indication that he will be blamed for something he did or that someone will complain about him to him in his work and he may feel regret. And whoever sees that he invited others to eat and they came and waited or They ate some food and finished, these are all indications of the kindness of the dreamer. They indicate the approach of goodness, relief, the arrival of livelihood, success, and the recovery of the sick, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that he invited someone to come and prepared food and did not see the present, this is good news for the dreamer that the absent will return or that he has not seen someone he loves for a long time, he will see him, God willing. Determination in the dream of a single woman Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream about her intention or the arrival of guests to eat at her house means kindness and success in her studies

title: Sweets in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about eating and buying sweets by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about sweets and the interpretation of his vision: There are many types of sweets, such as chocolate, cake molds, kunafa, and other different types of sweets that are loved by many, and each of them has a different interpretation when the dreamer sees it in a dream, and it also differs in the event. Of the different gender of the fortuneteller, and when one sees him in a dream, The Diviner begins to ask for his exact interpretation. Sweets in a dreamCandy in a dream means the arrival of good news and hearing good news, especially if they are of the types that the fortuneteller likes. If sweets are detected in a dream, pollution and eating From the dreamer, it means that he will earn forbidden money and his life will be full of problems and hardships. If the dreamer is a person who is tired in his life and does not feel comfortable and dreams that he eats so many sweets that his stomach is full, then this vision is very praiseworthy. Because it announces the end of the fatigue and pain that God felt in his life, and that he will receive abundant goodness until he is satisfied with it. If the candy in the dream is stained with dust or inedible materials, this indicates that the dreamer’s life is very difficult and he does not get what he wants from the world until after His difficult suffering will accompany him for a long time. A man who craves more sweets in a dream is evidence that he loves women very much in reality. Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream: A single man who eats sweets in his dream is evidence of his marriage, especially if he chooses them in the dream without anyone forcing him to. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating sweets in all their forms, this indicates that her husband fulfills all her requests and does not desire anything. If the dreamer sees that he is eating sweets in a dream and is surprised that they are spoiled sweets, this means that he will get something that will not be useful. Later in life he will choose not to make a bad choice. Still can't find what you're looking for? Log in from Google to the Egyptian dream interpretation site and see everything that interests you. Distributing sweets in a dream. An unmarried woman who is seen distributing sweets to people on the road, this is evidence that God will grant her a great victory that many talk about, and it also indicates her engagement. If one sees in His dream is that he is distributing sweets, then this is a sign of the abundance of his goodness, which will receive all his relatives and acquaintances in reality. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is distributing sweets, this is evidence that God will satisfy her heart and eyes with a beautiful baby, and his birth will be easy and simple. Seeing distributing sweets is good news. Birth for a childless woman, as well as good news for the traveler’s return, and also indicates the patient’s ascent and recovery from the illness that put him to bed. For a long period of time. Seeing the dead distributing candy. If a married woman dreams that her deceased father gives her candy, this is a beautiful vision that indicates that God is reassuring her that her problems will be resolved soon. If a mother sees that her dead son is giving her an amount of candy in her hand, this indicates her psychological need. Avenue to him, if this vision expresses the longing that the mother feels to see

title: Interpretation of a dream about a green chameleon by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a green chameleon in the dream of a single girl, a virgin girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man biting a chameleon colored green, red, black, and yellow. Interpretation of the chameleon in a dream according to pronunciation. The origin of the word chameleon comes from the Persian (kharba), so it is not good to see it inside homes in A dream, because it can express, according to this word, destruction, division, and conflicts between spouses, or it is not good in visions to see chameleons in factories, stores, warehouses, and closets, because it can be a symbol of bankruptcy, loss, or failure. The meaning of the word chameleon originally means (fighting). The sun), which in interpretation means ignorance, injustice, or seeking to spread lies unjustly. Interpretation of a green chameleon in a dream: A green chameleon in a dream deserves praise, because it can express problems that will disappear or fears that will end. His presence in the house or home indicates protection and immunity, because he eats insects and thus cleans the house while the kitchen is present, because he does not eat food or be nourished while he is in the bedrooms, and protection, and also indicates a faithful and generous husband. The wife, and sometimes it indicates male children if their young are seen, or females if their eggs appear in a dream. The bite of a green chameleon in a dream Being bitten by a green chameleon in a dream indicates a benefit that the dreamer will receive in his livelihood or body and it may be a sign of healing or the removal of distress. Sadness and anguish. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon - YouTube
